text: I flipped this into a hip-hop beat quite a few years ago. Nice to see this track on YouTube. Dude has great music.
author: Jimmie Ligon

text: Simplemente genial te llega asta lo más profundo del alma
author: Ruben Rosas

text:
Difícil interpretar melodias puras sem a interferência do ego, que se identifica sempre com memória, conhecimentos e vivências.
Tenku remete a algo como uma união de seres altamente inteligentes e amorosos num nível de vida que mal podemos conceber.
author: Σόλων Ωιειρα

text: ¡De todas las canciones de kitaro esta es la que mas te llega al corazon!... yo no puedo evitar derramar una lagrima cuando escucho esta pieza siempre pierdo, que alma mas noble la que tiene kitaro por dios.
author: Marcos Gabriel Flores Careaga

text: Escucha el final de Millky Way en vivo y ahí sí que vas a llorar...
author: Cristian Carrasco Aravena

text:
Estas suaves melodías están llenas de giros tan caprichosos
como los sueños de un niño, es la realidad o la imaginación, la que nos lleva
de regreso a nuestro lejano mundo infantil, donde todo es inocencia, pureza,
alegría, asombro, miedo. Es imaginación o realidad. Y este dulce soporte que
nos envuelve, cuando escuchamos el sonido de flautas, de cuerdas, de teclados;
sonidos que nos sumergen en el apacible lago musical del New Age. Saludos desde CDMX
author: Enrique Tellezgiron

text: unexpected and very welcomed addition to this list

text: kitaro the best

text: One of my personal favorites from Kitaro is "Dream". That album has a couple songs featuring vocals from Jon Anderson from the band Yes.
author: Boss Rush Mode

text: +Boss Rush Mode I had a dream once that I was a rap artist named E-Rekt Shun
author: Gorilla Games

text: I heard this on the radio today and immediately loved it, so I searched for the album and bought it. As a fan of New Age music, I have no idea how I didn't already know about Kitaro, one of the genre's pioneers. Tenku means "heavenly sky", which seems appropriate. I absolutely love the last part starting at 2:35 with the bells and the flute's awesome melody. Very inspiring, straight to the Relaxin' playlist.
author: SupraDarky

text: different from the usual game music but still very cool :^)
author: 1shotfinch

text: +SupraDarky Whoa, what radio station plays stuff like this? The radio stations here are only 90s alt rock, pop, and pop country.
author: Joshua Pruitt

text: +Joshua Pruitt There's a radio service here called Stingray and they have tons of genre specific stations. This played on their Spa station.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky  you awalys have such great taste in music keep this channel going man! i dont know much about new age but  is it just me or would this be perfect town music for a jrpg?
author: Dil Newt

text: +Dil Newt For me, I imagine it as the music for an opening to a jrpg. Some game with a unique setting and story.
author: Zack Devro

text: yeah i could see that but in my head it would have to be a old ps1 style opening
author: Dil Newt

text: +Zack Devro yeah sounds very FF7 style music
